verses.verse: And it came to pass<WH1961> in the eleventh<WH6249> <WH6240> year,<WH8141> in the first<WH259> day of the month,<WH2320> that the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> unto<WH413> me, saying,<WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man,<WH120> because that<WH3282> <WH834> Tyrus<WH6865> hath said<WH559> against<WH5921> Jerusalem,<WH3389> Aha,<WH1889> she is broken<WH7665> that was the gates<WH1817> of the people:<WH5971> she is turned<WH5437> unto<WH413> me: I shall be replenished,<WH4390> now she is laid waste: <WH2717>

Therefore <WH3651> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Behold,<WH2009> I am against<WH5921> thee, O Tyrus,<WH6865> and will cause many<WH7227> nations<WH1471> to come up<WH5927> against<WH5921> thee, as the sea<WH3220> causeth his waves<WH1530> to come up.<WH5927>

And they shall destroy<WH7843> the walls<WH2346> of Tyrus,<WH6865> and break down<WH2040> her towers:<WH4026> I will also scrape<WH5500> her dust<WH6083> from<WH4480> her, and make<WH5414> her like the top<WH6706> of a rock.<WH5553>

It shall be<WH1961> a place for the spreading<WH4894> of nets<WH2764> in the midst<WH8432> of the sea:<WH3220> for<WH3588> I<WH589> have spoken<WH1696> it, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD:<WH3069> and it shall become<WH1961> a spoil<WH957> to the nations.<WH1471>
And her daughters<WH1323> which<WH834> are in the field<WH7704> shall be slain<WH2026> by the sword;<WH2719> and they shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

For <WH3588> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Behold,<WH2009> I will bring<WH935> upon<WH413> Tyrus<WH6865> Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon,<WH894> a king<WH4428> of kings,<WH4428> from the north,<WH4480> <WH6828> with horses,<WH5483> and with chariots,<WH7393> and with horsemen,<WH6571> and companies,<WH6951> and much<WH7227> people.<WH5971>

He shall slay<WH2026> with the sword<WH2719> thy daughters<WH1323> in the field:<WH7704> and he shall make<WH5414> a fort<WH1785> against<WH5921> thee, and cast<WH8210> a mount<WH5550> against<WH5921> thee, and lift up<WH6965> the buckler<WH6793> against<WH5921> thee.
And he shall set<WH5414> engines<WH4239> of war<WH6904> against thy walls,<WH2346> and with his axes<WH2719> he shall break down<WH5422> thy towers.<WH4026>

By reason of the abundance<WH4480> <WH8229> of his horses<WH5483> their dust<WH80> shall cover<WH3680> thee: thy walls<WH2346> shall shake<WH7493> at the noise<WH4480> <WH6963> of the horsemen,<WH6571> and of the wheels,<WH1534> and of the chariots,<WH7393> when he shall enter<WH935> into thy gates,<WH8179> as men enter into<WH3996> a city<WH5892> wherein is made a breach.<WH1234>

With the hooves<WH6541> of his horses<WH5483> shall he tread down<WH7429> <WH853> all<WH3605> thy streets:<WH2351> he shall slay<WH2026> thy people<WH5971> by the sword,<WH2719> and thy strong<WH5797> garrisons<WH4676> shall go down<WH3381> to the ground.<WH776>

And they shall make a spoil<WH7997> of thy riches,<WH2428> and make a prey<WH962> of thy merchandise:<WH7404> and they shall break down<WH2040> thy walls,<WH2346> and destroy<WH5422> thy pleasant<WH2532> houses:<WH1004> and they shall lay<WH7760> thy stones<WH68> and thy timber<WH6086> and thy dust<WH6083> in the midst<WH8432> of the water.<WH4325>
And I will cause the noise<WH1995> of thy songs<WH7892> to cease;<WH7673> and the sound<WH6963> of thy harps<WH3658> shall be no<WH3808> more<WH5750> heard.<WH8085>

And I will make<WH5414> thee like the top<WH6706> of a rock:<WH5553> thou shalt be<WH1961> a place to spread nets upon;<WH4894> <WH2764> thou shalt be built<WH1129> no<WH3808> more:<WH5750> for<WH3588> I<WH589> the LORD<WH3068> have spoken<WH1696> it, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>

Thus <WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069> to Tyrus;<WH6865> Shall not<WH3808> the isles<WH339> shake<WH7493> at the sound<WH4480> <WH6963> of thy fall,<WH4658> when the wounded<WH2491> cry,<WH602> when the slaughter<WH2027> is made<WH2026> in the midst<WH8432> of thee?

Then all<WH3605> the princes<WH5387> of the sea<WH3220> shall come down<WH3381> from<WH4480> <WH5921> their thrones,<WH3678> and lay away<WH5493> <WH853> their robes,<WH4598> and put off<WH6584> their embroidered<WH7553> garments:<WH899> they shall clothe<WH3847> themselves with trembling;<WH2731> they shall sit<WH3427> upon<WH5921> the ground,<WH776> and shall tremble<WH2729> at every moment,<WH7281> and be astonished<WH8074> at<WH5921> thee.

And they shall take up<WH5375> a lamentation<WH7015> for<WH5921> thee, and say<WH559> to thee, How<WH349> art thou destroyed,<WH6> that wast inhabited<WH3427> of seafaring men,<WH4480> <WH3220> the renowned<WH1984> city,<WH5892> which<WH834> wast<WH1961> strong<WH2389> in the sea,<WH3220> she<WH1931> and her inhabitants,<WH3427> which<WH834> cause<WH5414> their terror<WH2851> to be on all<WH3605> that haunt<WH3427> it!

Now <WH6258> shall the isles<WH339> tremble<WH2729> in the day<WH3117> of thy fall;<WH4658> yea, the isles<WH339> that<WH834> are in the sea<WH3220> shall be troubled<WH926> at thy departure.<WH4480> <WH3318>

For <WH3588> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> When I shall make<WH5414> thee a desolate<WH2717> city,<WH5892> like the cities<WH5892> that<WH834> are not<WH3808> inhabited;<WH3427> when I shall bring up<WH5927> <WH853> the deep<WH8415> upon<WH5921> thee, and great<WH7227> waters<WH4325> shall cover<WH3680> thee;

When I shall bring thee down<WH3381> with<WH854> them that descend<WH3381> into the pit,<WH953> with<WH413> the people<WH5971> of old time,<WH5769> and shall set<WH3427> thee in the low parts<WH8482> of the earth,<WH776> in places desolate<WH2723> of old,<WH4480> <WH5769> with<WH854> them that go down<WH3381> to the pit,<WH953> that<WH4616> thou be not<WH3808> inhabited;<WH3427> and I shall set<WH5414> glory<WH6643> in the land<WH776> of the living;<WH2416>

I will make<WH5414> thee a terror,<WH1091> and thou shalt be no<WH369> more: though thou be sought for,<WH1245> yet shalt thou never<WH3808> <WH5769> be found<WH4672> again,<WH5750> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
